TOURNAMENT_VARIANTS_PER_PARAGRAPH.rule: E-INV-08: generate exactly 3 variants per paragraph for tournament
TOURNAMENT_VARIANTS_PER_PARAGRAPH.derivation: 3 variants = sufficient diversity without explosion. O(3*paragraphs).

TOURNAMENT_MIN_VARIANTS.rule: E-INV-08: minimum 2 variants for valid tournament (at least 1 alternative)
TOURNAMENT_MIN_VARIANTS.derivation: 1 variant = no tournament. 2 = minimum meaningful choice.

STYLE_MAX_DEVIATION.rule: E-INV-02: max deviation on any genome axis
STYLE_MAX_DEVIATION.derivation: Tighter than C.2 (0.3). Style engine must be MORE precise.

CADENCE_TOLERANCE.rule: E-INV-03: burstiness CV must be within +/-0.15 of target
CADENCE_TOLERANCE.derivation: Cadence is the most perceptible style feature. Tight tolerance.

LEXICAL_MIN_RARITY.rule: E-INV-04: at least 5% rare words (avoid generic IA text)
LEXICAL_MIN_RARITY.derivation: Human writers naturally use 5-15% uncommon vocabulary.

LEXICAL_MAX_RARITY.rule: E-INV-04: at most 20% rare words (avoid obscurantism)
LEXICAL_MAX_RARITY.derivation: Above 20% = purple prose / pretentious. Reader disengagement.

LEXICAL_MAX_CONSECUTIVE_RARE.rule: E-INV-04: no more than 3 consecutive rare words

SYNTACTIC_MIN_TYPES.rule: E-INV-05: at least 4 distinct syntactic structures used
SYNTACTIC_MIN_TYPES.derivation: Monotonous syntax = IA fingerprint. Diversity = human-like.

SYNTACTIC_MAX_RATIO.rule: E-INV-05: no single structure type exceeds 50%
SYNTACTIC_MAX_RATIO.derivation: Dominance > 50% = predictable rhythm. Reader detects pattern.

IA_MAX_DETECTION_SCORE.rule: E-INV-06: IA detection score must stay below 0.3

value: at the end of the day
IA_DETECTION_PATTERNS.rule: E-INV-06: each pattern found adds to IA detection score
IA_DETECTION_PATTERNS.derivation: Extended from C.2 list + additional high-frequency LLM patterns

GENRE_MAX_SPECIFICITY.rule: E-INV-07: text must not strongly match any single genre
GENRE_MAX_SPECIFICITY.derivation: Above 0.6 = genre-locked. OMEGA text transcends genre.

GENRE_MARKERS.rule: E-INV-07: genre markers used for classification scoring

VOICE_MAX_DRIFT.rule: E-INV-09: inter-paragraph style drift must stay below 0.2
VOICE_MAX_DRIFT.derivation: Above 0.2 = inconsistent voice. Reader notices jarring shifts.

SCORE_WEIGHT_GENOME.rule: Tournament scoring: 30% weight on genome compliance

SCORE_WEIGHT_ANTI_IA.derivation: Anti-detection is equally critical to genome compliance.

SCORE_WEIGHT_ANTI_GENRE.derivation: Genre transcendence important but secondary to IA/genome.

SCORE_WEIGHT_ANTI_BANALITY.derivation: Originality important but secondary to IA/genome.
